item.title: The Secret Power of Reconnecting With Old Friends
item.description: There’s a special boost that only old friends can give us. Here’s why we need it now.

item.title: Toxic Positivity Is Very Real, and Very Annoying
item.description: Forcing ourselves or others to always be positive can be harmful to our well-being and our relationships. There’s a better approach.

item.title: Daylight-Saving Time Ends Sunday. Four Ways to Win the Transition.
item.description: The fall back of the clock is coming. Those seeking to renew routines or become morning people can take advantage of the time switch.

item.title: A Jerk-Free Guide to Snowblowing
item.description: Here are snowblower rules that transcend time, population density, geography and politics. Follow them to keep peace in the neighborhood.

item.title: 10 Haunted House Ideas to Make Your Home Extra Spooky This Halloween
item.description: One-up your neighbors’ yard displays with these pro ideas—from customizable headstones to computer-animated eyes. Plus a jack o’lantern that outshines them all.

item.title: Netflix's 'Squid Game' Has Parents Asking: Should Kids Watch?
item.description: Kids are coming home begging to watch the violent Korean thriller. For some parents, trying to block it entirely is a battle not worth fighting.

item.title: Apple's iOS 15 Has a Fall-Prevention Feature Everyone Should Use
item.description: An update for iPhone’s iOS 15 determines your walk steadiness and offers insight into your risk of falling—but it’s what you do with the information that’s important.

item.title: Six Fall Getaways for Art Lovers, According to Art World Insiders
item.description: Plus, an extraordinary immersive museum in Japan well worth the wait.

item.title: 2021 Jeep Wrangler Unlimited Rubicon 4xe: A Hybrid That Comes Up Short
item.description: Jeep Wrangler’s first plug-in hybrid for the U.S. market complicates the driving experience in pursuit of regulatory credits and buyer incentives. And for most drivers, writes Dan Neil, it will get poor fuel economy.

item.title: How Shapewear---Like Spanx and Skims---Went From Underwear to High Fashion
item.description: And yes, Kim Kardashian West wore $72 Skims leggings under her Met Gala Balenciaga look this month.

item.title: The Best Coffee Beans to Buy---in More Ways Than One
item.description: Sustainability matters at least as much to many coffee drinkers as the flavor and the quality of the roast. These options aim to satisfy both connoisseurs and the conscientious.

item.title: How Wine Lovers Geek Out: The Best Insider Websites
item.description: A guide to our wine columnist’s most-trusted online sources for tasting notes, industry intel and guidance on when to uncork a valued bottle—all delivered with a delicious degree of sheer geekery.
